advancements.silentgear.kachink2.descrip: Lose an extra point of durability on a brittle item

advancements.silentgear.root.description: Fulfilling all your tool and armor needs
advancements.silentgear.salvager.title: Salvager
advancements.silentgear.salvager.descrip: When you don't need old gear anymore...
advancements.silentgear.shovel.title: A Better Shovel

advancements.silentgear.sickle.descripti: Craft a sickle to harvest many plants at once

advancements.silentgear.upgrade_base.des: You might want to make a few...
block.silentgear.salvager.desc: Can break down some items into their components
command.silentgear.lock_stats.invalid: Not holding a valid gear item
command.silentgear.parts.gearDoesNotCont: Item does not contain that part
command.silentgear.parts.sourceMustBePla: Command source must be a player
item.silentgear.blueprint.noMixing: Mixed materials only allowed in crafting station
item.silentgear.blueprint.partTypeWarnin: Part blueprints are usually not needed
These are workarounds for recipe conflicts
item.silentgear.blueprint_package.desc1: Contains some blueprints for gear crafting
item.silentgear.red_card_upgrade.desc: Allows the item to break permanently
item.silentgear.spoon_upgrade.desc: Allows pickaxes to work as a shovel
item.silentgear.rough_rod.desc: Can be used to craft tools like in vanilla, but has some negative effects. Good for emergencies.
gui.silentgear.crafting_station.parts_bu: List can be sorted by stats
trait.silentgear.adamant.desc: Armor increases damage resistance, tools deal more damage to mobs with a base health of more than 10 hearts
trait.silentgear.ancient.desc: Increases XP dropped by blocks and mobs
trait.silentgear.aquatic.desc: Full set of armor gives water breathing, deals more damage to aquatic mobs
trait.silentgear.brittle.desc: Gear sometimes takes extra damage (cancels with Malleable)
trait.silentgear.chilled.desc: Deals more damage the Nether and fire-immune mobs
trait.silentgear.chipping.desc: Reduces armor protection or increases harvest speed as gear is damaged
trait.silentgear.eroded.desc: Increases harvest speed and decreases attack damage as gear is damaged
trait.silentgear.fiery.desc: Adds Fire Aspect or Flame to appropriate gear
trait.silentgear.flame_ward.desc: Gives fire resistance on armor (full set only)
trait.silentgear.flexible.desc: Gear occasionally takes less damage (cancels with Brittle)
trait.silentgear.holy.desc: Deals extra damage to the undead
trait.silentgear.jagged.desc: Increases attack damage as tool is damaged
trait.silentgear.lustrous.desc: Tools gain a large harvest speed boost when in light
trait.silentgear.malleable.desc: Gear sometimes takes less damage (cancels with Brittle)
trait.silentgear.organic.desc: Gains enchantability, but loses magic damage as the item is damaged
trait.silentgear.refractive.desc: Places lights in dark areas nearby
trait.silentgear.silky.desc: Adds Silk Touch to harvest tools
trait.silentgear.soft.desc: Reduces harvest speed as tool is damaged
trait.silentgear.stellar.desc: Armor gives speed and jump boost, items slowly repair themselves
trait.silentgear.synergistic.desc: Gear gets a synergy bonus (if base value is more than 100%)
command.silentgear.invalidItemType: Item in main hand (%s) does not seem to be a Silent Gear tool/armor item
command.silentgear.lockStats.success: Stats on §e%s§r are now %s§r (assuming item is valid)
jei.silentgear.blueprint.desc: Blueprints and templates are used to craft tool heads and armor. Blueprints can be reused infinitely, templates are single-use. When used in the crafting station, you can mix materials. Otherwise, the materials must all be the same. Check the tooltip of the blueprint/template for details on crafting the final item.
jei.silentgear.crafting_station.desc: An improved crafting table which has a small internal inventory and a window which shows the tooltip of the item being crafted. Allows material mixing when crafting tool heads or armor.
jei.silentgear.dagger.desc: Basically a very light sword. Low damage and shorter reach, but very high attack speed. It also reduces the target's invulnerability time when hit.
jei.silentgear.katana.desc: A sword that is slightly faster, but a little weaker than classic swords. Katana can also reach a little further than standard swords.
jei.silentgear.lumber_axe.desc: An axe which chops down entire trees by breaking a single block. The logs and leaves must be correctly tagged to be recognized as a tree.
jei.silentgear.machete.desc: A multi-function blade. It's a sword, axe, and sickle, but works best as a sword. Slightly slower attack speed, but higher damage than standard swords. Like sickles, it can clear an area of plants, but the range is smaller.
jei.silentgear.mattock.desc: The ultimate farming tool, capable of tilling and digging soil and chopping wood. A bit slower than a shovel or axe, but more durable. Should work in anything that requires a hoe.
jei.silentgear.part_analyzer.desc: Determines the quality of main parts. Requires no power or fuel. Hoppers can insert/extract items. Has an optional "catalyst" slot which will improve average grade.
jei.silentgear.red_card_upgrade.desc: Tools and armor with the red card upgrade can break like their vanilla counterparts, instead of becoming a "broken" item that can still be repaired.
jei.silentgear.spoon_upgrade.desc: Let's your pickaxe mine dirt and such. Because reasons.
jei.silentgear.sword.desc: A classic sword with balanced damage and speed. The guard takes the appearance of the second material used in crafting.
jei.silentgear.tip_upgrade.desc: Allows an existing tool/weapon to be further upgraded. Most tip upgrades will add (or subtract) a fixed amount to certain stats, but some add will multipliers instead. Hold the Ctrl key to view stat modifiers in the tooltip.
jei.silentgear.tool_head.desc: Tool heads, blades, bow limbs, and more! These are the core of tools and weapons, constructed with a blueprint/template and some number of main tool materials. Check the blueprint/template tooltip for more info.
jei.silentgear.tooltip.sample2: Gear made with any materials will work
misc.silentgear.exampleOutput2: If you crafted this, something went wrong!
misc.silentgear.missingRod: Missing a required rod, some stats reduced
misc.silentgear.missingRod.attack: Your tool is missing a rod!
misc.silentgear.missingBowstring: Missing required bowstring, cannot be fired
misc.silentgear.notifyOnBreak: Your %s has broken. You should fix that.
misc.silentgear.poorlyMade: This item is poorly made and will not last long
